channel.title: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?
channel.description:
i have KBD set up in the emotes, but its called "dance" so when you clikc on the "dance" emote it teles you to the spot i made, but how can i change it from saying "dance" and make it say "KBD"?
my source is gangscape V5

item.title: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?
item.dc:creator: @flargie flargie
item.description:
@flargie wrote:

can you give me the rest of the interface ids please? or how could i find them? thanks!

i also have one more thing i was wondering if you could help me with:

problem: i have an NPC spawned and i made a shop, but how do i give that NPC the shop?

solution: all i need is to know how to add the shop, to the actually NPC

Read full topic

item.source: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?

item.title: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

This is all wrong. Use these interfaces:

173 = Wave
175 = Bow
176 = Dance
177 = Angry
178 = Think
179 = Beckon
180 = Yes
181 = No
182 = Cry
185 = Laugh
186 = Cheer
187 = Clap

Use the method below to replace each one:

sendFrame126("text here", ??);

Substitute ?? for the interface ID. Let me know if this works.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?

item.title: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?
item.dc:creator: @flargie flargie
item.description:
@flargie wrote:

this is what i did,

  1. i added this so when you click dance it takes you here.

break; case 166: // skill if(emotes == 0) { teleportToX = 2919; teleportToY = 9693; sendMessage("welcome to the skilling area!"); } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

  1. i go up to the list of things that says

sendFrame126("@whi@Bank", 180);//first emote slot sendFrame126("@red@Train",181); sendFrame126("@whi@Heal", 178); sendFrame126("@red@Jad",175); sendFrame126("@whi@Shop",177); sendFrame126("@red@MB",182); sendFrame126("@whi@admins", 185);//7th emote slot sendFrame126("@red@Abbys", 186);//8th emote slot sendFrame126("@whi@train2", 173);//9th emote slot sendFrame126("@red@Mine", 179);//10th emote slot sendFrame126("@whi@Agility", 187);//11th emote slot sendFrame126("@whi@pkb", 13362);//13 emote slot

  1. i found that, now i added-
sendFrame126("skill", 166); //dance
  1. i than compiled, and restarted server, but it still said dance there… what happened?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?

item.title: How do i add\change words inside the emotes?
item.dc:creator: @TheKidXXX TheKidXXX
item.description:
@TheKidXXX wrote:

add this

sendFrame126("KBD", 166); //dance

for other…

sendFrame126("Char", 168);//not sure which one it it
sendFrame126("No", 181);//no
sendFrame126("cheer", 171); //cheer?
sendFrame126("wave", 163); //wave?
sendFrame126("yes", 170); //yes?
sendFrame126("dance", 166); //dance
sendFrame126("beckon", 167); //beckon?
sendFrame126("Matr", 178);//3rd one

Read full topic
